sandy.parser.ParserStack

type
class
extends
flash.events.EventDispatcher
ParserStack utility class.

An utility class that acts as a parser stack. You can a set of parser objects, and it process to the loading/parsing automatially and sequentially.

@author Thomas Pfeiffer - kiroukou @author Niel Drummond - haXe port @since 3.0 @version 3.1 @date 12.02.2008

Static Variables

COMPLETE : String

Defines the value of the type property of a parserstack_complete event object. @eventType parserstack_complete

ERROR : String

Defines the value of the type property of a parserstack_error event object. @eventType parserstack_error

PROGRESS : String

Defines the value of the type property of a parserstack_progress event object. @eventType parserstack_progress

Instance Variables Hide Inherited Show Inherited

progress : Float

Public progress percent var. It gives the percentage of the loading/parsing status of the different parsers.

Retrieve the parser you stored by the associated name. If no parser with that name is found, null is returned
